description:
If we create an instance with the default ephemeral disk and then to re-size it down, we get wrong ephemeral size.

    eph_size = (block_device.get_bdm_ephemeral_disk_size(ephemerals)

It will return 0, if you don't create an ephemeral disk by the means of --block-device explicitly - nova will create a 'default' ephemeral disk for you, which won't be listed in block device mapping.
title: Don't allow to resize down the default ephemeral disk

Author: Mike Durnosvistov <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Feb 24 12:41:04 2015 +0200

    libvirt: don't allow to resize down the default ephemeral disk
    
    It was possible to create an instance with the default ephemeral
    disk and then to re-size it down, when it should have been forbidden
    explicitly, just as for the root disk.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1428072
